meanings.sent1: The swamp was fennier than the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The lake water looked fennier after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The fennier mud made squelching sounds as we walked through it.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a fennier tone when she spoke about her childhood.
meanings.sent5: The fennier smell of the forest lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: The salad tasted fennier with the added herb.
meanings.sent2: The dish had a fennier flavor due to the spices used.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added a fennier amount of fennel to the soup.
meanings.sent4: The aroma in the kitchen was fennier than usual.
meanings.sent5: The tea had a fennier aftertaste that lingered on the palate.
